thread.title: Spring 2017 Collection of Apple Watch Bands Launched
thread.title_full: Spring 2017 Collection of Apple Watch Bands Launched

author: Rajesh Pandey
title: Spring 2017 Collection of Apple Watch Bands Launched
text:
Spring 2017 Collection of Apple Watch Bands Launched Posted by Rajesh Pandey on Mar 21, 2017 | No Comments Pin 1 Shares 87 
Apple today introduced its latest lineup of bands for the Apple Watch featuring bright new colors and materials. The new collection also includes a standalone Nike Sport Bands, Woven Nylon band with a wide stripe, and more. 
The new regular Apple Watch bands that will be available from Apple’s online store and authorised retailers from today are as follows: Sport in Pebble, Azure and Camellia Woven Nylon in Berry, Tahoe Blue, Orange, Red, Pollen and Midnight Blue Classic Buckle with new buckle design in Sapphire, Berry and Taupe 
Apple will now also be selling the Nike Sport Bands separately in three colors: Anthracite/Black, Pure Platinum/White, and Volt/Black. In addition to the new watch bands, Apple also released new Apple Watch Nike+ models in the following variants: Space Grey Aluminum Case with Anthracite/Black Sport Band 38mm and 42mm Silver Aluminum Case with Pure Platinum/White Sport Band. 
For the fashionistas, Apple also released new Apple Watch Hermés bands in four different flavours: 38mm Double Tour in Bleu Zéphyr Epsom leather 38mm Double Buckle Cuff in Fauve Barenia leather 42mm Single Tour in Lime Epsom leather 42mm Single Tour in Colvert Swift leather 
The Apple Watch Series 2 will now also include a 38mm Double Buckle Cuff in Fauve Barenia calfskin leather, with an exclusive Hermès Sport Band in signature orange bundled with it. 
All the new watch bands are available for order immediately from Apple’s online store and retail stores worldwide. The new Apple Watch, Nike+, and Hermes variants will be available for purchase from late March. 
Which new band for your Apple Watch do you like the most? Do you plan on buying one? Like this post? Share it!
